identity.name: Electric Midnight
identity.core_philosophy: Content is the light source. The UI is the shadow.

grid_system.feed: flex flex-col h-[100dvh] overflow-y-scroll snap-y snap-mandatory scrollbar-hide
grid_system.desktop_layout: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-[240px_1fr_350px] h-screen max-w-[1600px] mx-auto

buttons.ghost: hover:bg-white/10 text-white h-10 w-10 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center transition-colors

inputs.default: bg-zinc-900/50 border-zinc-800 focus:border-primary focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-xl h-12 px-4 text-white placeholder:text-zinc-600

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Update `tailwind.config.js` to use the 'Electric Midnight' color palette. Override the default shadcn colors in `index.css` with the hex codes provided.
2. FONT SETUP: Add the Google Fonts import to `index.css` immediately. Apply `font-unbounded` to all headings and `font-body` to all text.
3. LAYOUT: The 'For You' page MUST be `h-[100dvh]` (dynamic viewport height) to prevent mobile browser bar issues. Use `snap-y snap-mandatory` for the TikTok-like scroll.
4. VIDEO PLAYER: Do not use a default HTML5 video player control bar. Build custom overlay controls (Play/Pause on tap, Mute toggle, Progress bar at bottom).
5. GLASSMORPHISM: Use the `glass_panel` class for the Comment Modal and Share Sheet. It must feel like a premium layer on top of the video.
6. MOBILE FIRST: Design for mobile first. On desktop, center the video feed (max-width 450px) and use the extra space for navigation and discovery, or use a 3-column layout.
7. NO WHITE BACKGROUNDS: The app is strictly dark mode. Never use white backgrounds for containers. Use `bg-zinc-900` or `bg-black`.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements (e.g., `like-button`, `comment-input`, `login-submit`).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic gradients or centered layouts.
Micro-interactions: Every button press must have a scale effect (`active:scale-95`).
Spacing: Use generous padding inside containers, but keep the video feed edge-to-edge.
Accessibility: Ensure text on top of videos has a text-shadow or a subtle gradient overlay for readability.
